name: City Center
description: Heart of the city with dense commercial areas, government buildings, and cultural landmarks.

name: Central Business District
description: Core commercial area featuring offices, shopping complexes, and urban residences.

name: East Delhi Zone
description: Eastern side of the city known for its residential colonies and local markets.

name: West Delhi Zone
description: Western part of the city with mixed-use areas and industrial hubs.

name: North Delhi Zone
description: Northern region with historic areas, residential neighborhoods, and parks.

name: South Delhi Zone
description: Southern part known for upscale residential areas, malls, and educational institutions.

name: Northwest Suburb
description: Developing region with residential projects, green belts, and educational centers.

name: Southwest Suburb
description: Emerging area with housing societies, shopping complexes, and connectivity to airport.

name: Northeast Zone
description: Area with a mix of older colonies and growing infrastructure.

name: Southeast Zone
description: Residential and commercial areas with cultural diversity and improving civic amenities.

name: Remote/Online
description: Work or participation options available online, accessible from any location in India.

name: Across City
description: Opportunities or services that operate in multiple zones throughout the city.
